title: Man About Town
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img746_4406.jpg)
  
Anybody know witch font “James Franco” is written with?

/Blame

 [‹ Need Help Identifying 3 Fonts PLEASE](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103916/http:/typophile.com/node/50807 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lovely Package logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103916/http:/typophile.com/node/50818 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Blame

comments.content: Ok, but I mean the other one. “Jemes Franco”

Good call, Jan!  
It’s somewhere between [Lydian](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/lydian/) and [Fanfare](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103916/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/fanfare_condensed_ot_std_urw/). Haven’t seen Harbour before.
I hadn’t either. Stumbled over it when browsing T-26 fonts.
Thanx Jan! This forum is just Super!
